comprehensive_overview: LongQC is a quality control tool for long-read sequencing data, designed specifically for third-generation sequencing technologies like Pacific Biosciences (PacBio) and Oxford Nanopore Technologies. It aims to assess the quality of raw long-read sequencing data and provide users with detailed insights into the characteristics of the sequenced reads.
core_features: Quality assessment of long-read sequencing data
Identification of sequencing errors and artifacts
Visualization of sequencing metrics and quality scores
Detection of chimeric reads and adapter sequences
Assessment of base-call accuracy and read-length distribution
